alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 10:03AM CST until March 11 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County. .The Big Muddy River at Murphysboro is cresting around 25 feet today. It is then forecast to fall below flood stage by Friday night. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Some minor flooding in S 3rd & Division / Plum Street area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting around 25 feet today. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
